abstract: Debate over whether Ferdinand E Marcos, former dictator of Philippines, should have his remains moved to hero's cemetery has provoked national reckoning over that period in country's history; Pres Rodrigo Duterte supports move, and nation's Supreme Court is expected to rule on petition blocking reburial, even as protesters on both sides of issue have taken to streets.
lead_paragraph: Ties, possibly financial, between President Rodrigo Duterte and the family of the dictator Ferdinand E. Marcos have raised questions of motives.
snippet: Ties, possibly financial, between President Rodrigo Duterte and the family of the dictator Ferdinand E. Marcos have raised questions of motives....

headline.main: Push to Give Marcos a Philippine Hero’s Burial Finds an Ally in Duterte
headline.print_headline: Push to Give Marcos a Philippine Hero’s Burial Finds a Powerful Ally
